statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 4 , 6 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 10 , -3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - x + 5 , 3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - x + 4 , 4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
